articles.description: Noah Lyles feels "proud" to win 200m bronze after hopes of becoming the first man since Usain Bolt to complete an individual Olympic sprint double were wrecked by Covid-19.
articles.title: Noah Lyles: Paris 2024 Olympics sprint double bid wrecked by Covid-19

articles.description: American Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone smashes her own world record to win Olympic 400m hurdles gold in Paris.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Sydney McLaughlin-Levrone wins 400m hurdles gold in world record

articles.description: France's Leon Marchand tells BBC Sport's Natalie Pirks that he is "still waiting to wake up" and that the experience of winning four Olympic gold swimming medals and one bronze at Paris 2024 "feels like a dream".
articles.title: Leon Marchand: Paris 2024 'feels like a dream'

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Jade Jones loses in the first round of the taekwondo but Katarina Johnson-Thompson makes an excellent to her heptathlon campaign at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from day 13 of the 2024 Games

articles.description: Great Britain's Katarina Johnson-Thompson leads the heptathlon after four events as the two-time world champion pursues a first Olympic medal.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Katarina Johnson-Thompson leads heptathlon after four events

articles.description: A star-studded United States side show their quality when it matters to fight back from a 13-point deficit and beat Serbia in a thrilling Olympic men's basketball semi-final.
articles.title: Olympic basketball: Steph Curry and LeBron James lead US into final with comeback win

articles.description: Botswana's Letsile Tebogo claims a surprise 200m gold as American Noah Lyles is denied an Olympic sprint double at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Letsile Tebogo claims 200m gold as Noah Lyles takes bronze

articles.description: Great Britain's Ellie Aldridge claims gold in the sailing's women's kite final at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Paris Olympics sailing: GB's Ellie Aldridge wins gold in sailing's women's kite final
